original: At 2:00 PM, Aster de Wyverngarde went to pay his respects at his fatherâ€™s coffin. Unbeknownst to him, however, there was a Glyph of Contingency set to trap him inside a Force Cage. The trap triggered and Aster was trapped in that magical cage for its duration. Aster attempted to break the Force Cage by casting Fire Bolt. This created fresh traces of evocation which makes it impossible to tell when the Glyph of Contingency was placed. There were traces of illusion magic at the crime scene. This might imply that someone hid themselves from the guards as they set this trap.
